summary: This document is an email exchange between Lesley Groff and Paul Morris regarding Jeffrey Epstein's schedule. Lesley informs Paul that Jeffrey will be in New York on September 20th and the following week. The communication is marked as confidential.

persons.name: Lesley Groff

persons.context: Paul Morris is responding to Lesley Groff regarding Jeffrey Epstein's plans.

persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the person whose schedule is being discussed.

Lesley Groff is passing along information from Jeffrey Epstein to Paul Morris, indicating a connection.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's Visit to New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is scheduled to be in New York on this date.

Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned to be in New York on September 20th and the following week.
Paul Morris is identified as a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank Private Bank.
